import React, { Component } from "react"; class Postpickups extends Component { state = { results: [] }; handleFormSubmit = event => { let data = { storeName: this.state.storeName, pickUpAddress: this.state.pickUpAddress, pickUpCity: this.state.pickUpCity, pickUpState: this.state.pickUpState, pickUpZip: this.state.pickUpZip, userName: this.state.userName, dropOffAddress: this.state.dropOffAddress, dropOffCity: this.state.dropOffCity, dropOffState: this.state.dropOffState, dropOffZip: this.state.dropOffZip, payOut: this.state.payOut, storeName: this.state.payOut }; event.preventDefault(); }; handleInputChange = event =>{ const name = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; this.setState({ [name]: value }); }; render() { return (

)} } export default Postpickups;
